{{cpp/utility/source_location/title|line}}
{{cpp/utility/source_location/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++20 |
constexpr std::uint_least32_t line() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the line number represented by this object.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The line number represented by this object.

An implementation is encouraged to return {{tt|0}} when the line number is unknown.

===Example===
{{example |
 | code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;
#include &lt;source_location&gt;

inline void cur_line(
    const std::string_view message = "",
    const std::source_location&amp; location = std::source_location::current())
{
    std::cout
        &lt;&lt; location.line() // &lt;- the line # of a call site
        &lt;&lt; ") "
        &lt;&lt; message; 
}

int main()
{
    cur_line("++\n");
    cur_line(); std::cout &lt;&lt; "Hello,\n";
    cur_line(); std::cout &lt;&lt; "C++20!\n";
    cur_line("--\n");
}
 | output=
17) ++
18) Hello, 
19) C++20! 
20) --
}}
